dashboard.mid.passwordRequirement: The password must contain uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers (0-9) and special characters (exclusively [-.,;:%#@=\"+&()!*/]).
dashboard.mid.managingDirectorDescriptio: If your organization does not have a managing director, please enter the name of the person primarily responsible for your organization here.
dashboard.mid.legalNameHelp: (You can find the legal name of your company in the commercial register extract)
dashboard.mid.organizationInfoDescriptio: This data represents your company. All fields are optional, but those marked with MID are required to participate in the MID lottery.
dashboard.mid.organizationCreationDescri: Set up your organization account. Fields marked with * are required to get started. You can add more details later for MID applications.
dashboard.mid.quickSetupDescription: You can optionally enter your organization's Impressum URL here and click the button so our form tries to fill some fields automatically based on the public information in your Impressum. It only takes 1 second. You can of course edit any field afterwards.
dashboard.mid.midContactDescription: The person in your organisation who is the contact person for MID projects for RapidWorks and the funding agency. Unless someone else is specified, the managing director listed is also the MID contact person.

dashboard.mid.midContactOptions.same: Managing Director is also MID contact

dashboard.mid.projectContactHelp: Please enter the technical contact person here.

dashboard.mid.bankAccountDescription: Is required by MID for the lottery ticket submission.
dashboard.mid.taxIdHelp: You can find your organization's tax number (In Germany \"Steuernummer\") on a letter from the tax office, in Elster, or on your business registration, for example.
dashboard.mid.bankName: Name of the Bank of the Business Account
dashboard.mid.companyTypeOptions.associa: Association of natural and/or legal persons
dashboard.mid.companyCategory: Company category according to SME definition
dashboard.mid.companyCategoryOptions.mic: Micro enterprise: Annual turnover & balance sheet total < 2 Mio. €.
dashboard.mid.companyCategoryOptions.sma: Small enterprise: Annual turnover & balance sheet total < 10 Mio. €.
dashboard.mid.companyCategoryOptions.med: Medium enterprise: Annual turnover < 50 Mio. € & balance sheet total < 43 Mio. €.
dashboard.mid.companyCategoryOptions.lar: Large enterprise: Annual turnover >= 50 Mio. € or balance sheet total > 43 Mio. €.
dashboard.mid.industryOptions.media: Media and Creative Industries (Architecture, Design, Literature, Press, Software/Games, Fine Arts, Film, Music, Broadcasting, Theater, Dance, Culture)
dashboard.mid.industryOptions.manufactur: Other Manufacturing (Food and Feed Production; Beverages; Textiles; Wood; Paper; Chemical and Pharmaceutical Products; Furniture etc.)
dashboard.mid.industryOptions.energy: Energy and Environmental Economy (including water supply)
dashboard.mid.industryOptions.profession: Provision of Professional Scientific Technical Services (e.g. Legal and Tax Consulting, Business Consulting, Architecture Offices, Photography etc.)
dashboard.mid.employeesHelp: Some subsidy programs use the total number of employees, others use full-time equivalents. If you don't know the exact figures off the top of your head, rough estimates will suffice. However, the thresholds for subsidies are 10, 50, and 250 employees. So it is only important that your number is in the correct range (0-9, 10-49, 50-249, 250+). Within this range, it can be inaccurate (e.g., 25 instead of 29 is okay, but 10 instead of 9 is a relevant difference).
dashboard.mid.totalEmployeesHelp: Count every social secured employee as one complete employee, indifferent of worked hours
dashboard.mid.fullTimeEquivalentsHelp: Counting based on weekly hours (e.g., 0.5 for half-time employee)
dashboard.mid.employees: Number of employees including partner and affiliated companies (Full-time equivalents)

dashboard.task.description1: Describe the task (In German or English).
dashboard.task.description2: will then directly review it and make sure everything is understood perfectly. He might reach out to you via push notification to make sure the task is understood correct. Once all is clear

dashboard.task.description4: will fulfill the task and send you the result once finished. Regardless of how long
dashboard.task.description5: took, we will charge you the agreed fixed price in the next monthly invoice.

branding.hero.title: Transform Your Brand Visibility
branding.hero.subtitle: Establish a strong market presence quickly with a complete, professional brand identity package delivered in just one week.
branding.mainText: Establish your market presence quickly with our comprehensive Rapid Branding package, delivered in just one week and including:
branding.bundleItems.website.title: Your Startup Website
branding.bundleItems.website.description: An elegant, responsive website with a clear call to action for your target group. We coach you on what components a startup website needs to generate leads and attract customers and create it for you.
branding.bundleItems.qrCode.title: QR code and Calendar link integration
branding.bundleItems.qrCode.description: We link the online and offline world for you. In our intuitive form, you can specify a calendar link for each founder and where it should appear (email signature, business card, website). You can also specify where we should insert the QR code to your website (business card, rollup)
branding.bundleItems.socialMedia.title: Social Media Banner
branding.bundleItems.socialMedia.descrip: A meaningful social media banner through which founders and employees can show their affiliation to the startup. The purpose of the banner is to communicate your mission at a glance.
branding.bundleItems.stationery.title: Business Card print file & Email signature
branding.bundleItems.stationery.descript: Your business card doesn't have to win a design competition, instead it has to create a recognizable value for you and your startup. That's why we add your profile picture, the QR code of your landing page and a graphic background that matches your startup's activity as standard.
branding.bundleItems.wallpapers.title: Digital Wallpapers
branding.bundleItems.wallpapers.descript: A discreet wallpaper in your startup's brand design for smartphones and laptops. In our intuitive form, every founder can specify which smartphone they use.
branding.bundleItems.rollup.title: Rollup template print file
branding.bundleItems.rollup.description: A roll-up in your brand design. Rollups don't have to appeal to everyone and don't have to make your startup look bigger than it is. But your target group needs to understand what problem you solve for them just by looking at it. We help you find the most important message for your rollup and integrate the QR code of your website on it.
branding.bundleItems.apparel.title: Hoodie print file
branding.bundleItems.apparel.description: Without a hoodie you wouldn't be a startup. You would just be self employed. Luckily we got your cofounders and you covered with a hoodie print file.
branding.faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
branding.faq.items.0.question: What is a Rapid Branding worth?
branding.faq.items.0.answer: Only you can determine its true value to your business. At agencies, the combined cost of all Rapid Branding components would typically range between €10,000 and €15,000, involving several weeks of waiting time and countless additional hours of coordination on your part. We drastically reduce costs by using a combination of automation and smart processes.
branding.faq.items.1.question: Why is a Rapid Branding so important for startups?
branding.faq.items.1.answer: Our honest opinion? It's not. Startup founders have more important things to do than worry about design. We believe the founding team's most important task is to focus on their market and product. However, from both our own founding experience and consulting over 50 startups, we've recognized that developing brand visibility consumes a disproportionate amount of resources in terms of time and money, and contains too many pitfalls for inexperienced founders. While not as complex as the problems startups solve, the connection and coordination of visibility elements is detailed and meticulous. We handle these details for you, aiming to deliver your complete Rapid Branding within days, making you operational for the next year.
branding.faq.items.2.question: Why should I have RapidWorks create my Rapid Branding?
branding.faq.items.2.answer: Our team combines startup founding experience with design and development expertise. We know exactly what a startup needs to reach and convince customers. We're also cost and time-efficient in creating Rapid Brandings, having semi-automated the creation of several bundle components.
branding.faq.items.3.question: In what form do I receive the Rapid Branding contents?
branding.faq.items.3.answer: Upon completion, you'll receive an email with access to cloud storage containing all components of your Rapid Branding in digital form. Each file is saved in an appropriate format and clearly named. You'll also receive each file in an editable format. Our goal is to make you self-sufficient rather than creating dependency on us or other service providers. We don't provide physical materials, but you can use our files to have them produced at any print shop.
branding.faq.items.4.question: Does RapidWorks offer other services?
branding.faq.items.4.answer: Yes, the Rapid Branding is our market entry, but our mission goes much further. We offer personal coaching with Yannick, MVP development, software development services at unbeatable prices, and free financing consultation. See RapidWorks for more information.
branding.faq.items.5.question: What's the quality level of the Rapid Branding?
branding.faq.items.5.answer: Comparable to the RapidWorks Rapid Branding you see showcased on this website. Your bundle will be created by Yannick and Samuel, exactly like the RapidWorks Rapid Branding. We're transparent that you shouldn't expect Apple-level design from us, but we're convinced that few startups need that level of design quality in the early stage.
branding.faq.items.6.question: What if I have special requests for my Rapid Branding?
branding.faq.items.6.answer: You can note special requests in our form. We'll review them and inform you whether we can implement them within the offer or arrange an alternative solution.
branding.faq.items.7.question: Do I give up rights to my Rapid Branding or startup idea?
branding.faq.items.7.answer: You retain all rights to your idea and Rapid Branding. We don't share any data with third parties. However, if your startup targets other startups with design, coaching, or development services, there might be a conflict of interest.
branding.faq.items.8.question: Who is the Startup Rapid Branding offer for?
branding.faq.items.8.answer: In short - startups. See Start-up-Unternehmen – Wikipedia. If you're not sure whether you're a startup but need the Rapid Branding, feel free to fill out our form.
branding.faq.items.9.question: Do I need to have already founded my startup to receive a Rapid Branding?
branding.faq.items.9.answer: No, you can fill out our application form even if you haven't founded your company yet.
branding.faq.items.10.question: What if I already have some contents of the Rapid Branding?
branding.faq.items.10.answer: No problem. In our form, you can upload any files you already have and tell us how to incorporate them into your Rapid Branding.
branding.faq.items.11.question: When will I receive my Rapid Branding?
branding.faq.items.11.answer: Since we've semi-automated the creation of several bundle components and are an experienced team in creating Rapid Brandings, we complete at least one bundle per week. We process orders on a First In – First Out – Wikipedia basis and intentionally keep our pipeline small. Your bundle will be completed promptly and quickly - significantly faster than you could likely create or outsource it yourself.
branding.faq.items.12.question: How much does it cost to print all the media?
branding.faq.items.12.answer: Depending on the provider, around €100 per rollup, €30 per hoodie, €20 for 500 business cards. We will soon recommend providers with whom we have had good experiences.
branding.mvp.title: Need an MVP in 2 Weeks?
branding.mvp.description: Transform your idea into a working product with our rapid MVP development service. Zero upfront cost, pay only when amazed.
branding.finalCta.title: Ready to Transform Your Brand?
branding.finalCta.subtitle: Get your complete brand identity package today.
branding.howItWorks.title: How It Works
branding.howItWorks.steps.0.title: Submit Your Brand Info
branding.howItWorks.steps.0.description: Share your brand vision, colors preferences and potentially existing graphics to include through our simple form.
branding.howItWorks.steps.1.title: We Create Your Assets
branding.howItWorks.steps.1.description: We craft your complete Rapid Branding and present it to you once finished. If you are not satisfied with the bundle you don't have to pay.
branding.howItWorks.steps.2.title: Review & Refine
branding.howItWorks.steps.2.description: We are also happy to help you if you notice any small adjustment requests afterwards. A minor feedback iteration after a few days is already included in the offer.
branding.features.title: Contents
branding.features.subtitle: The Rapid Branding contains everything you need to draw the attention of customers, partners, investors and employees to your startup. You immediately become visible and a uniform brand design makes your brand recognizable.
branding.inhalt.title: Contents
branding.inhalt.description: The Rapid Branding contains everything you need to draw the attention of customers, partners, investors and employees to your startup. You immediately become visible and a uniform brand design makes your brand recognizable.

branding.cookies.modal.necessary.descrip: These cookies are required to enable basic website functions and save your language preferences or other preferred options.
branding.cookies.modal.analytics.title: Performance and Analytics
branding.cookies.modal.analytics.descrip: These cookies provide statistical information about the use of our website. With their help, we can count visits and traffic sources to improve the performance of our website.
branding.cookies.modal.marketing.title: Marketing & Advertising
branding.cookies.modal.marketing.descrip: These cookies are used by third parties to display personalized advertising that is relevant to your interests.

branding.pricing.title: The Rapid Branding Package
branding.pricing.subtitle: Your complete brand identity – in just 7 days
branding.pricing.editableFiles.title: Editable files included
branding.pricing.editableFiles.descripti: All included elements are delivered in editable format (e.g. PDF, PNG, SVG). You receive all files digitally. You can print your elements as often as you like with the partners of your choice.
branding.pricing.flexibleAdjustments.des: Further adjustments are possible at any time – for only 40 €/hour. We always offer you an effort-based fixed price, so you always have full cost control.
branding.benefits.title: Why Rapid Branding is the best choice
branding.benefits.items.0.title: Speed
branding.benefits.items.0.description: Get your complete branding package within just 7 days. Perfect for startups.
branding.benefits.items.1.title: All inclusive
branding.benefits.items.1.description: You get everything you need from one source. This saves you unnecessary communication with multiple parties.
branding.benefits.items.2.title: Professional appearance
branding.benefits.items.2.description: Cross-media visual and image language signals competence and creates trust.
branding.benefits.items.3.title: Flexibly adaptable
branding.benefits.items.3.description: You can request adjustments at any time - For full cost control, we always give you a fixed price.

coaching.hero.title: Your Idea, Live in 2 Weeks
coaching.hero.subtitle: Get your MVP free of charge, only pay when you are amazed by the result.
coaching.services.title: Our Services
coaching.services.subtitle: Tailored solutions to launch your idea faster than ever
coaching.services.strategic.title: Strategic Coaching
coaching.services.strategic.description: One-on-one expert coaching by an experienced founder to help validate and refine your idea. We'll work together to define your MVP and create a roadmap for success.
coaching.services.development.title: Rapid MVP Development
coaching.services.development.descriptio: We bring your MVP to life in just 2 weeks. Focus on your core business while we handle the technical implementation, delivering a fully functional product ready for user testing.
coaching.services.funding.title: Funding Guidance
coaching.services.funding.description: We assist startups in securing government funding to support their growth and development.
coaching.services.funding.features.2: Support for startups in North Rhine-Westphalia
coaching.services.funding.specialNote: * This funding is specific to NRW, but we can support startups in other regions as well.
coaching.approach.title: Our 3D Approach to MVP Success
coaching.approach.subtitle: A proven methodology to turn your idea into a market-ready product
coaching.approach.steps.discovery.title: Discovery
coaching.approach.steps.discovery.descri: Together we dive deep into your idea, market, and goals to create a solid foundation for your MVP. Our guidance helps refine your concept for maximum customer validation.
coaching.approach.steps.development.desc: We bring your MVP to life in just 2 weeks, using cutting-edge technologies. We focus on core features that demonstrate your product's value to real customers.
coaching.approach.steps.delivery.title: Delivery
coaching.approach.steps.delivery.descrip: We present your fully functional MVP, ready for user testing. So far this has been completely free of charge. If you're not amazed by your MVP right now, you don't have to buy it. The only thing you have to invest is 2 weeks of our time.
coaching.why.title: Why Founders Choose RapidWorks
coaching.why.subtitle: Unmatched speed, expertise, and support for your journey
coaching.why.features.founders.title: Built By Founders, For Founders
coaching.why.features.founders.descripti: We understand your unique challenges and time constraints because we've been there ourselves.
coaching.why.features.speed.title: Lightning Fast Development
coaching.why.features.speed.description: Get your MVP in just 2 weeks, accelerating your time to market and investor pitches.
coaching.why.features.risk.title: Risk-Free Engagement
coaching.why.features.risk.description: Free consultation and 2-week development period. Pay only when you're satisfied with your MVP.
coaching.why.features.funding.title: Government Funding Support
coaching.why.features.funding.descriptio: For startups in North Rhine-Westphalia, we assist in applying for government funding covering 70% of our services.
coaching.postMVP.title: Our Offer After Your MVP
coaching.postMVP.subtitle: Continue your journey with flexible, high-quality development support
coaching.postMVP.features.hours.title: 1,000 Hours of Development
coaching.postMVP.features.hours.descript: Access a pool of 1,000 development hours to use as needed. Start and stop at your convenience.
coaching.postMVP.features.developer.desc: Work with the same developer throughout the year, ensuring consistency and deep understanding of your project.
coaching.postMVP.features.payment.title: Flexible Payment
coaching.postMVP.features.payment.descri: Pay only for the hours worked, billed at the end of each month. Cancel anytime with no long-term commitment.

financing.hero.title: Need help getting Financing?
financing.hero.subtitle: We help startups navigate the complex world of financing, from grants and subsidies to venture capital and strategic partnerships.
financing.mainSection.title: The right financing at the right time
financing.mainSection.description: Every stage of your startup journey requires different financing strategies. We work with you to identify the optimal funding mix for your current needs and future growth plans.
financing.modal.title: Schedule a Free Consultation
financing.testimonials.title: Funding Success Stories
financing.testimonials.subtitle: Read how startups navigated the financing landscape with our support.
partners.hero.title: Find Your Advisors
partners.hero.subtitle: Not every advisor is suited for a startup's needs. We know that, so we help you find the right one. Let us know which advisors you need in the next months and we'll find them.
partners.partners.title: Indicate Your Needs
partners.partners.subtitle: Select the timeframe (in months) when you anticipate needing each type of expert.
partners.partners.items.0.title: Notary
partners.partners.items.1.title: Tax Advisor
partners.partners.items.1.description: For tax declarations, optimization, bookkeeping setup.
partners.partners.items.2.title: Auditor
partners.partners.items.2.description: For financial statement audits, compliance checks.
partners.partners.items.3.title: Legal Advisor
partners.partners.items.3.description: For contracts, investment rounds, legal disputes.
partners.partners.items.4.title: Funding Consultant
partners.partners.items.5.title: Data Protection Officer
partners.partners.items.5.description: For GDPR compliance, data privacy policies.

partners.partners.demandInfo.subtitle: We connect with experts once sufficient demand is identified. Your input shapes our partner network!

coachingPage.heroSubtitle: Year-round coaching by veteran founders who have been in your shoes and know what it takes to succeed.
coachingPage.whySection.title: Why Founder Coaching Matters
coachingPage.whySection.description: Being a founder is the hardest job in the world. Our coaching program provides the guidance, accountability, and support you need to navigate challenges and accelerate your growth.
coachingPage.coachSection.title: Meet Your Coach
coachingPage.coachSection.subtitle: Work directly with an experienced founder who understands the challenges and opportunities of building a successful startup.
coachingPage.coachSection.coachBio: I am Yannick, the Founder and CEO of RapidWorks, the 3rd Startup I cofounded so far. In my Startup journey until now I built amazing software products, recruited hundreds of employees, sold amazing services to thousands of customers, scaled Startups quickly bootstrapped as well as investor financed but crucially made tons of mistakes down the road. As your Coach I will help you gaining the best results for your Startup and avoiding unnecessary mistakes.
coachingPage.coachSection.education: BSc Mathematical Technical Software Engineer, FH Aachen
coachingPage.howItWorks.title: How Our Coaching Works
coachingPage.howItWorks.subtitle: A structured approach designed to deliver measurable results for your business.
coachingPage.howItWorks.steps.0.title: Initial Assessment
coachingPage.howItWorks.steps.0.descript: We start with a comprehensive assessment of your business, goals, challenges, and opportunities.
coachingPage.howItWorks.steps.1.title: Strategy Development
coachingPage.howItWorks.steps.1.descript: Together, we create a customized coaching plan with clear objectives and key results (OKRs).
coachingPage.howItWorks.steps.2.title: Regular Sessions
coachingPage.howItWorks.steps.2.descript: Ongoing coaching sessions focused on implementation, problem-solving, and accountability.
coachingPage.howItWorks.steps.3.title: Measure & Adjust
coachingPage.howItWorks.steps.3.descript: Regular progress reviews to celebrate wins, learn from setbacks, and refine your strategy.
coachingPage.achievements.scaledStartups: Scaled both Startups to 8 figure valuations
coachingPage.achievements.coachedStartup: Coached 50 Startups in the DigitalHUB Aachen
coachingPage.testimonials.title: Transformed Through Coaching
coachingPage.testimonials.subtitle: Discover how our personal coaching helped founders overcome challenges and accelerate your business growth.
homePage.hero.subtitle: You are not alone, 80% of the problems faced by startups are identical. We solve these at unbeatable prices, so you can spend your time and capital on your core business.
homePage.whoWeAre.title: Who We Are
homePage.whoWeAre.description: We are Startup enthusiasts. We have experience in Software Development, Marketing, Finance, Fundraising, Validating market needs and especially founding startups ourselves and working with startups. We know the pains and the gains, the ups and downs and have been in your shoes before. We know the most painful parts of being a founder and provide affordable solutions so founders can focus on their business again instead of getting hung up.
homePage.commonGround.title: What All Our Offers Have in Common
homePage.commonGround.points.0.title: They are tailored to your individual needs
homePage.commonGround.points.0.descripti: There is no one-size-fits-all solution for startups. That's why we don't offer pre-packaged deals but take the time to understand your specific challenges and goals. Whether you need just one service or a comprehensive solution, we tailor our offerings to fit your needs.
homePage.commonGround.points.1.title: They deliver measurable results with unparalleled speed
homePage.commonGround.points.1.descripti: Startups cant afford to loose time. We know that, so we built all our services so that you can get the first measurable results in just 1 week time. Doesn't matter if you need to enter a market, develop an mvp, get expert coaching, have a meeting with a tax advisor ... we will get you in action.
homePage.commonGround.points.2.title: They are either free or can be subsidized
homePage.commonGround.points.2.descripti: We know that in startups, every Euro invested must create 10 Euros in value. Therefore, we have designed all our services so that they can be subsidized through funding programs, or are completely free for you. We are happy to show you free of charge which subsidies are available to your startup and gladly support you with the application process.
homePage.commonGround.points.3.title: They build upon each other
homePage.commonGround.points.3.descripti: All of our services build on one another, though they don't require each other. You can step in and out at every stage. If you need guidance finding out which of our services might help you the best feel free to book a free call with us to discuss your individual needs together. By the way we will stop you from booking services we don't see fit your current biggest needs. We hope for your understanding.
homePage.commonGround.points.4.title: They all provide cost transparency and always deliver value before we charge you
homePage.commonGround.points.4.descripti: You will always know upfront what we will charge and when we will do so. We will always only charge when you are satisfied with our work.
homePage.commonGround.points.5.title: They are strategically designed
homePage.commonGround.points.5.descripti: Our services are not random offerings but strategically designed elements that work together to move your startup forward. Each service is purposefully crafted to address specific startup challenges at the right time in your journey.
homePage.services.title: Our Services
homePage.services.subtitle: Everything you need to build and scale your startup, all in one place.
homePage.services.rapidAnswers.title: Rapid Answers
homePage.services.rapidAnswers.descripti: Ask your early-stage startup questions live! Join our free Q&A webinar with experienced founders.
homePage.services.branding.title: Rapid Branding
homePage.services.branding.description: Get visible to your market in 1 week cheaper than building it yourself!
homePage.services.experts.title: Rapid Experts
homePage.services.experts.description: Find your expert the same day cheaper than own employees!
homePage.services.partners.title: Rapid Partners
homePage.services.partners.description: Connect with verified notaries, tax advisors, auditors, and more.
homePage.services.coaching.title: Rapid Coaching
homePage.services.coaching.description: Unleash your full potential with year-round coaching by a veteran founder!
homePage.services.workshops.title: Rapid Workshops
homePage.services.workshops.description: Close your business knowledge gaps. Don't become reliant on consultants!
homePage.services.financing.title: Rapid Financing
homePage.services.financing.description: Don't know how to finance your growth now? Did you know you can get up to 80% of our services subsidized? There are several options, contact us for free to learn more!
homePage.financingSection.title: Need Financing?
homePage.financingSection.subtitle: Don't worry about how to finance your growth, we will show you the possibilities and help you apply for subsidies.
homePage.bundle.title: Rapid Bundle
homePage.bundle.description: Reach the next level with all our Services combined in one bundle!
homePage.bundle.financingNote: Du denkst das wäre unbezahlbar? Ganz im Gegenteil, gemeinsam mit dir bereiten wir die Finanzierung unserer Dienstleistungen vor und suchen nach Fördermitteln, um die Kosten für dich auf einen Bruchteil marktüblicher Preise zu reduzieren!
homePage.cta.title: Ready to accelerate your startup?
homePage.cta.description: Book a call with our team and discover how RapidWorks can help you build and scale your company.
homePage.modal.title: Schedule a Free Consultation
homePage.testimonialSection.title: Real Results, Rapid Growth
homePage.testimonialSection.subtitle: Hear directly from founders who leveraged RapidWorks services to accelerate their startup journey.
testimonials.1.quote: First, RapidWorks helped me secure €50,000 in subsidies. In parallel, we set up our branding in just 5 days, allowing us to scale to customers right as the subsidy was granted. With Yannick as our coach, we maintain momentum through weekly sessions. Thanks to our Rapid Expert, we're adding new features to our software daily at an unprecedented pace. These services combined helped us validate demand, pivot our marketing, and reach paying customers, putting us on track for growth. Thank you RapidWorks, it would have taken years to get where we are now in just 10 weeks!
testimonials.2.quote: The Rapid Branding package gave us a professional look overnight. The website looks fantastic, and the quick turnaround was exactly what we needed to start our marketing push.
testimonials.3.quote: Yannick's coaching sessions are invaluable. His experience helped us avoid critical mistakes and stay focused on our strategic goals. Highly recommended for any early-stage founder.
testimonials.4.quote: Navigating the subsidy landscape was daunting. RapidWorks made the financing process smooth and successful, securing essential funding for our growth.
testimonials.5.quote: Getting access to a skilled software expert on demand through Rapid Experts accelerated our development cycle significantly. It's flexible and cost-effective.
testimonials.6.quote: The branding process was incredibly efficient. RapidWorks delivered a complete set of assets, including our new website design, social media banners, and even billboard mockups, all within a week. This quick turnaround was crucial for our market launch.
testimonials.7.quote: Rapid Works helped us align our business and brand with our values. The branding and website reflect our mission perfectly, and the process was smooth and inspiring. Highly recommended for any impact-driven business!
exploreMore.titleTemplate: Did you know we do more than just {service}?
exploreMore.description: Check out our other services to help you grow your startup - from expert assistance to MVP development, coaching, and financing solutions.
